The Courier.Description: The Merchant|merchant no longer runs out of cards, relics, or potions and his prices are reduced by 20%.
The Courier.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

The Specimen.Description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.
The Specimen.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Thinking Ahead.Description: Draw 2 cards. Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Thinking Ahead.Name: Thinking Ahead

Thread and Needle.Description: At the start of each combat, gain 5 Plated Armor.
Thread and Needle.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Thunderclap.Description: Deal 4(7) damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Thunderclap.Name: Thunderclap

Tingsha.Description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.
Tingsha.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Tiny Chest.Description: Gain 30 Gold. You are 10% more likely to find treasure in Map Locations|? rooms.
Tiny Chest.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Tiny House.Description: Obtain 1 potion. Gain 30 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 card.
Tiny House.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Toolbox.Description: At the start of each combat, add a random Neutral cards|colorless card to your hand.
Toolbox.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Tools of the Trade.Description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.
Tools of the Trade.Name: Tools of the Trade

Torii.Description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked Attack damage, reduce it to 1.
Torii.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Tough Bandages.Description: Whenever you Discard|discard a card during your turn, gain 3 Block.
Tough Bandages.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Toxic Egg.Description: Upon pick up, choose and Upgrade a Skill.
Toxic Egg.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Toy Ornithopter.Description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 3 HP.
Toy Ornithopter.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Transmutation.Description: Add X random (upgraded) colorless cards into your hand. Exhaust.
Transmutation.Name: Transmutation

True Grit.Description: Gain 7(9) Block. Exhaust a random(not random) card from your hand.
True Grit.Name: True Grit

Unceasing Top.Description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.
Unceasing Top.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Underhanded Strike.Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, deal 7 (10) damage to a random enemy.
Underhanded Strike.Name: Underhanded Strike

Unload.Description: Deal 12 (16) damage. Discard ALL non-Attack cards.
Unload.Name: Unload

Uppercut.Description: Deal 13 damage. Apply 1(2) Weak. Apply 1(2) Vulnerable.
Uppercut.Name: Uppercut

Vajra.Description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.
Vajra.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Velvet Choker.Description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.
Velvet Choker.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

War Paint.Description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Skills.
War Paint.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Warcry.Description: Draw 2 cards. Place a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Warcry.Name: Warcry

Well-Laid Plans.Description: At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1 card.
Well-Laid Plans.Name: Well-Laid Plans

Whetstone.Description: Upon pick up, Upgrade 2 random Attacks.
Whetstone.Name: File:Wound.png|thumb|280x280px

Whirlwind.Description: Spend all energy. Deal 5(8) damage to ALL enemies X times.
Whirlwind.Name: Whirlwind

Wild Strike.Description: Deal 12(17) damage. Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.
Wild Strike.Name: Wild Strike

Wraith Form.Description: Whenever you play a Skill, deal 3 (5) damage to a random enemy.
Wraith Form.Name: Wraith Form
